title: Bug 116744: Dynamic text content type has no effect
description: When using a dynamic text element to display the contents of a database field with three types of content (HTML text within <html>...</html> tag, HTML fragments not within <html> tag, and text with RTF tags), the dynamic text content type has no effect.
OB: The dynamic text content type does not render the HTML tags or RTF tags correctly and displays them as plain text.
EB: The dynamic text content type should render the HTML tags as formatted HTML and the RTF tags as formatted text in the displayed content.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Create a database field with three types of content: HTML text within <html>...</html> tag, HTML fragments not within <html> tag, and text with RTF tags.
2. Use a dynamic text element to display the contents of this field.
3. Observe that the HTML tags and RTF tags are not rendered correctly in the dynamic text element.
